H0.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Tokyo

H1.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Madrid

H2.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. Doha

H3.text: What city will host the 2016 Olympics. BRRIO

A4.text: Rio de Janeiro was announced as the host city at the 121st IOC Session in Copenhagen, Denmark, on 2 October 2009.

A5.text: The final voting was held in Copenhagen on 2 October 2009, with Madrid and Rio de Janeiro considered favorites to secure the Games. Rio de Janeiro took a significant lead over Madrid, heading into the final round; the lead was held, and Rio de Janeiro was announced as host of the 2016 Summer Olympics.
